title: A sermon made: by the famous doctor Erasmus of Roterodame
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publisher: Imprynted by me Robert wyer, dwellynge at the sygne of saynt IohnÌ„ euangelyste, in saynt Martyns parysshe, besyde Charynge crosse, in the bysshop of Norwytche rentes,
